title: Open Your Purse with Patia’s Fantasy World
description:
This won’t be your typical Throwing Fits episode. This week is about amplifying a necessary voice. Today we are joined by our friend Patia of Patia’s Fantasy World who has quickly become one of our go-to resources on social media in learning about this country’s systemic racism, taking direct action and spreading crucial information. Patia is dialing in to discuss The Fantasy World Master List of Resources on How to Dismantle Systemic Racism, the Black Lives Matter movement, microaggressions, the #BlackOutTuesday debacle, performative allyship, destructive neoliberal beliefs, effecting impactful change, Shaun King, Virgil Abloh, the power and responsibility of celebrity, causes célèbres, tangible mid-term goals, her faith in young people and much more.
Check out The Fantasy World Master List of Resources on How to Dismantle Systemic Racism here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16CFLrMySyQR8cLTmACUKtHfc-UQ9PUA0ktLAfApydS8/edit#gid=0
